_comment: D-PC AI Providers Configuration - Manage your local and cloud AI providers. Copy this to ~/.dpc/providers.json and customize.

providers._comment: Local Ollama provider - No API key needed

_examples._comment: Example configurations for cloud providers - Add these to the providers array above

_field_reference._comment: Reference guide for provider configuration fields

common_fields.alias: User-friendly name for the provider (must be unique)
common_fields.context_window: Optional: Override default context window size in tokens

openai_compatible_fields.api_key: API key (plaintext - only use for local providers)
openai_compatible_fields.api_key_env: Environment variable containing API key (recommended for cloud)

anthropic_fields.api_key_env: Environment variable containing Anthropic API key (required)

_security_notes._comment: Best practices for API key management
recommendations: Use 'api_key_env' for cloud providers (stores keys in environment variables)
Use 'api_key' only for local providers where security is not a concern
Never commit API keys to version control
Set environment variables in your shell profile (~/.bashrc, ~/.zshrc)
On Windows, use System Environment Variables or PowerShell profile
